item.description:
For the seventh year running (and the grand finale for intrepid organizer Scott), a horde of zombies, zombie hunters, zombie outbreak survivors, and even pro- and anti-zombie protesters will take to the streets for Boston for the Zombie March. This event regularly draws hundreds of participants - dress in your undead finest and join the fun! The swarm starts at South Station around 3 PM an shambles off at 3:30.

Facebook event here: http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: Zombie March VII: Saturday, May 28
